alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern DeKalb and central Fulton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over East Point, or near Atlanta, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Sandy Springs, East Point, College Park, Chamblee, Clarkston, Hapeville, Avondale Estates, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Atlanta, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, Sweet Auburn, Piedmont Park and Cascade Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
